sources.title: Soul Man | Full Movie Thriller | English Captions
sources.description:
This is the story of Iris, a ballet dancer who is driven to search for Otis, an old friend she has not seen in 10 years. Her investigations lead her to a psychiatric hospital where Otis has been hospitalized during that time. Once there, those responsible for the center warn that Otis has developed a mysterious alternative personality, which they have nevertheless managed to block. Following Otis's release, the medics also inform Iris about Otis's unpredictability. After they both suffer a violent episode, Otis' alternate personality "Soul Man" takes control of the situation. In Spanish-Castilian with English subtitles.
2019.  Stars: Jerry Adam, Sebi Alcaraz, Pascual Belastegui

metadata.Plot: Sadly, all good things must come to an end, and now, the party is over for the carefree, pampered, and very white California kid, Mark Watson. As a result, with his self-made millionaire father refusing to pay the tuition to attend the prestigious Harvard Law School, Mark's only hope rests on a full scholarship intended for an African-American applicant, and a bunch of tanning pills. Now, with his curly perm and the dark complexion, Mark can fraudulently make his dream come true; however, has Mark ever considered the ramifications, moral and legal, of his deception?
metadata.Actors: C. Thomas Howell, Rae Dawn Chong, Arye Gross
